documents.t: Installation, Activate and Upgrade of Bit Assist
Another wordpress site (subdomain or another domain)

Integration Request Currently, we collecting feature requests from facebook community. And adding new features based on most voted feature requests in facebook poll. If you have any feature request, please feel free to submit in facebook poll here. Loading...

First, create a widget, then edit the widget Click on add channel to add the support assistant of your choice. Search & Select the channel of your choice from the channels popup Channel Title: Set the proper Channel Title. Default it's taken, Call. This Title is descriptive text for visitors. Input your Phone Number With this Hide after office hours feature of Widget Options, You can organize your office time by enabling the Hide after office hours option. You have to upgrade to pro to use the feature. With this Channel show on feature of Widget Options, you can now afford to hide or show channels on mobile and desktops as of your choice. Now save the channel by clicking the Save button. Then you will see a successful channel-created message. Loading...
15-12-2022 Fixed Security plugins blocking bit-assist iframe source
13-12-2022 Added Next & Prev button added in Knowledge Base modal New Features Fixed Knowledge Base & FAQ link not working
12-12-2022 Added Custom channel create New Channels Custom image change in widget & channel New Features Copy widget New Features Refresh button in the form response table New Features
30-11-2022 Added Copy channel New Features File upload field in custom form channel New Features New channel Waze New Channels Fixed Channel reordering issue
23-11-2022 Added Hide credit option Feedback field in custom form channel New channel design Fixed WP admin menu overflow on bit-assist modal
19-11-2022 Added Custom Form Rating (Star & Smiley) field in custom form channel New Features Fixed Old mysql version issue
14-11-2022 Added Call To Action close button
12-11-2022 Fixed Widget Delay & Widget Scroll conflict
23-11-2022 Fixed Create new widget not checking if already has a active widget

First, create a widget, then edit the widget Click on add channel to add the support assistant of your choice. Search & Select the channel of your choice from the channels popup Channel Title: Set the proper Channel Title. Default it's taken, Custom Form. This Title is descriptive text for visitors. Create Form: Create a form with the appropriate field of your preference. Button Text: Here you can change the submit button name. Default it's taken, Submit. Success Message: Here you can set the success message. Default it's taken, Submitted Successfully. Store Responses: By enabling this option, form submission data will be stored in Bit Assist. Send Mail To: An email will be sent with the form entries after visitors submits the form. Here, you have to input the email address of him who will receive the mail. Webhook URL: Here you can set the third-party webhook URL and send the submitted data to our application/platform that supports Webhook. Form Theme Color: You can change the form theme color of your preference. Form Text Color: You can change the form test color of your preference. Hide after office hours: You can organize your office time by enabling the Hide after office hours option that you have already configured from settings. Channel show on: You can now afford to hide or show channels on mobile and desktops as of your choice with this feature. Save: Now save the channel by clicking the Save button. Then you will see a successful channel-created message. Responses: You can show the form entries with the response option. Loading...
👉 You can change the widget name with this option
👉 You can change the chat widget color of your preference with this option.
👉 You can change the chat widget Icon of your preference with this option.
👉 Can be changed the widget position. There are four types of positions available in this option. Top Left, Top Right, Bottom Left, Bottom Right.
👉 You can change the widget size with this option. The widget size will not support more than 200 pixels. Size range: Widget size must be between 0 and 200.
👉 You can choose any of your favorite widgets that are available.
👉 You can change Color, Height, Width, Position, etc. To use this feature, you have to upgrade to pro.
👉 If you enable this option, you can hide the By Bit Assist text from the live widget. Loading...

First, create a widget, then edit the widget Click on add channel to add the support assistant of your choice. Search & Select the channel of your choice from the channels popup Channel Title: Set the proper Channel Title. Default it's taken, Discord. This Title is descriptive text for visitors. Input your Discord Invite code With this On click open channel on feature of Widget Options, You can open your channel in a new tab, or current tab, or a new window. Default it's taken, New Tab With this Hide after office hours feature of Widget Options, You can organize your office time by enabling the Hide after office hours option. You have to upgrade to pro to use the feature. With this Channel show on feature of Widget Options, you can now afford to hide or show channels on mobile and desktops as of your choice. Now save the channel by clicking the Save button. Then you will see a successful channel-created message. Loading...

You can configure the Bit Assist widget on multiple websites with a Bit Assist dashboard or WordPress. For example, you can use the Bit Assist widget on another domain or subdomain. In addition, you can use your device on other sites without using the Bit Assist plugin. Also, you can use the Bit Assist widget outside of WordPress. like. another wordpress, Drupal, Joomla, Wix, Shopify, Squarespace, Weebly, zoho sites, And Others.

➦ Follow the below steps First, create a widget; in the row of your created widget, you will see 'Use widget in' option. Select the external site there. Edit the widget and go to the external publish tab Copy the link of the domain where you want to use this widget. Paste in the add domain field, then click the right button Copy the script and Paste it just above the tag on your website. Done. Now your Bit Assist widget live on another website.

First, create a widget, then edit the widget Click on add channel to add the support assistant of your choice. Search & Select FAQ from the channels popup Channel Title: Set the proper Channel Title. Default it's taken, Custom Form. This Title is descriptive text for visitors. You can customize the text in bold and italics and include links in the text in the FAQ description. Form Theme Color: You can change the form theme color of your preference. Form Text Color: You can change the form test color of your preference. Hide after office hours: You can organize your office time by enabling the Hide after office hours option that you have already configured from settings. Channel show on: You can now afford to hide or show channels on mobile and desktops as of your choice with this feature. Save: Now save the channel by clicking the Save button. Then you will see a successful channel-created message. Search: The visitor can search faq easily if you have a lot of faqs. Loading...

documents.s: Installation, Activate and Upgrade of Bit Assist

documents.t: Follow the path mentioned below: At first, navigate to your wordpress & navigate to plugin. Then click on Add new. Go to search option & search Bit Assist. Click Install now & then Activate free version. Now you can see Bit Assist in your WordPress plugin list. After successful installation you can see the home page of Bit Assist'. Now You are ready to create Integration.

At first go to our website bitapps.pro/bit-assist Go to Pricing section of pro version. Now you can see all the plans of Bit Assist. Select your desired plan & you can customize the quantity of sites. Click on Proceed. You have to fill up the form for membership account to use the premium version of Bit Assist. Give your location & payment information. Pay the amount via any credit card or PayPal. Also can use coupon card if you have any. After you will be redirected to subscription page. You can check your subscription is activated or not by reloading the page. After you will be notified via your email with download link , license key, tutorial link & documentation link. Now, go to your subscription dashboard. Here you can see your subscription details. You can also update your plans at any time. Download the pro version by clicking the option. Then go to your WordPress dashboard & again navigate to plugin option. Click on Add New & select upload plugin. Click on Choose File & select the zip file you have downloaded before. Then click on Install Now. Then press on Activate Plugin. After you will see the pro version of Bit Assist on your plugin list. Then go to Bit Assist from dashboard & you will find license option. And now copy the key from subscription page & paste the key on license key option. After clicking Submit button you will be shown a successful message. Congratulations! Now you are a pro member of the Bit Assist. Now you can access pro features, updates & support. Loading...

👉 You can organize it with your office time by enabling this option. You have to upgrade to pro to us the feature.
👉 You can show and hide the chat widget on a few specific pages of your site With this option. You have to use the pro version to use this feature
👉 Decide when the widget will appear for the first time. You can show it after a few seconds or on page scroll.
👉 The message displayed above the chat widget is the perfect way to grab the visitor's attention. And also you add delayed time for this.
👉 You can show configured channels to visitors when they visit the site, or visitors can click the chat widget to open it. Loading...
